project.name: C-C806B-WIRE-07-ST03-DT06-DF11-CF22-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added a Socket Server to accept communication from untrusted source. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C806B-WIRE-07-ST03-DT06-DF11-CF22-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Open saved .pcap file Has a buffer declared on the heap. malloc(64*sizeOf(char)) If input is shorter than 64 it will overflowdue to using improper sizeof and strlen checking

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C806B-WIRE-07-ST03-DT06-DF11-CF22-01-GOOD-02
iopair.description: export first 50 packets from saved pcap, run md5sum on newly created pcap Has a buffer declared on the heap. malloc(64*sizeOf(char)) If input is shorter than 64 it will overflowdue to using improper sizeof and strlen checking

process.script: /opt/stonesoup/workspace/scripts/service_mon.sh ss-localhost 8887 && curl -v --data-urlencode data="Hello World! If this statement isn't more than 64 characters, it will go badly" --header "If-Match: weak_taint_source_value" --request POST --no-buffer --output /opt/stonesoup/workspace/testData/logfile.txt --silent --show-error http://ss-localhost:8887
